H0.text: In what year was the first in-flight movie shown on an internal flight in the USA.. 1915

H3.text: In what year was the first in-flight movie shown on an internal flight in the USA.. 1929

A4.text: The film The Lost World was shown to passengers of an Imperial Airways flight in April 1925 between London (Croydon Airport) and Paris.
